text: Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao xiang bu xinyang zhe [wei xinzhe] yiyang, dang tamen de xiongdi [wei an la zhidao] zai da dishang luxing huo canjia zhandou shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Jiaru tamen tong women zai yiqi, tamen jiu buzhi siwang huo zhenwangle.” Yibian an la yi ci chengwei tamen xinli de yi zhong huihen. An la neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.
